Data.questions: How does the Digital Storefront handle inventory management?
Data.answer: The Digital Storefront ensures real-time inventory traceability and maintains a unified product master across both physical and online platforms. This allows for consistent inventory accuracy and lets customers know exactly whatâ€™s available at any moment

Data.questions: What benefits does the integrated experience of the Digital Storefront provide?
Data.answer: By integrating online shopping with in-store services, the Digital Storefront reduces overhead costs and enriches the shopping experience. This integration creates a comprehensive retail solution that facilitates seamless transitions between online browsing and in-store purchasing.

Data.questions: How does the Digital Storefront enhance product discovery for customers?
Data.answer: The system enhances the shopping journey with smart product discovery tools, including advanced search engines and recommendation systems. These tools swiftly direct customers to the products that best meet their needs and preferences, enhancing user satisfaction and engagement.

Data.questions: What is Click-and-Collect and how does it benefit customers?
Data.answer: Click-and-Collect is a feature that allows customers to shop online and pick up their purchases at the store. This option offers the flexibility to inspect, return, or immediately take home their items, providing a convenient solution that combines the benefits of both online and in-store shopping.
